Reviews.Title: Palm Treo 755p is a great phone1
Reviews.Author: JayJay
Reviews.Content: I have owned this phone since September 2007 and love it!  The phone has never given me any trouble even after I dropped it a few times.  I prefer reading web items from my easy chair so I do not have web service from Sprint with this phone but it is available.  It has a manual touch keyboard on the front and an on-screen keyboard. The camera is very good and the battery last very nicely. My appointments and memos with alarm are always correct. Contacts are easy to use with automatic features. I am just now having to replace the battery which never got sluggish.

Reviews.Title: My Favorite PDA Ever
Reviews.Author: DARYL HAYNES
Reviews.Content: Even when my cell phone company quit servicing this unit as a phone, I continue to use it as a PDA for calendar, contact information (over 250 names, addresses, birthdates, names of family members, etc), memos, task lists, and on and on.I fell on some ice recently and landed on my big purse, breaking my TREO unit, so I ordered a new one from Amazon and transferred ALL of my information including photos from my computer backup files.  Love this unit!

Reviews.Title: Plam treo 755
Reviews.Author: RB
Reviews.Content: Pretty good condition, but the Palm reo 755 resets itself occasionally and the Bluetooth to my car doesn't work. This is a very important feature.

Reviews.Title: very good condition!
Reviews.Author: Tony Senande
Reviews.Content: very good condition!  replaced old phone still like it...would recommend to others if looking for this phonebut it!

Reviews.Title: Trep 755
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel M. Hanley
Reviews.Content: Great buy, product was not damaged or missing any parts. The product arrived on time. Product worked perfectly with no malfunctions.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: William K Upton III
Reviews.Content: It worked great. However, I found that you can't get software anymore that lets you transfer documents to it from a  Windows 7 computer.

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: E. Mitchell "Elice"
Reviews.Content: This phone lasted exactly 3 weeks. The phone went dead and refused to charge. I had to go and purchase a refurbished certified phone from Sprint for double what I paid for this phone. I am not happy or satisfied at all with this purchase.
